Ukraine's air defence destroys 28 out of 31 Russia-launched drones, Kyiv saysRussia launched 31 drones and 2 missiles at Ukraine overnight, mostly targeting the south of the country, with air defences destroying 28 drones and both missiles, the Ukrainian military said on Monday. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 06:46:53 GMT朗维拉NK7FHBY65CVGKTTII https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-air-defence-destroys-28-out-31-Russia-launched-drones-kyiv-says-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian has the upper hand in arms race with the West - Russian minister saysRussia has the upper hand in weapons production over the West and intends to keep the rate of growth high, a top Russian minister said on Monday after both the West and Russia ramped up arms production for the Ukraine war. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 06:14:36 GMT SWLKNBF64RPA5FZXO5ENND2OEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-has-upper-hand-arms-race-with-west-Russian-minister-says-2023-12-25/Reuters世界欧洲
Christmas in China brings glittering decor and foreign influence concernsGiant Christmas trees adorned with lights, tinsel and gift boxes greet shoppers at glittering malls in big Chinese cities like Shanghai and Chongqing, but in many parts of China, extending season's greetings is out of the question. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 05:30:59 GMT AHZ5DQYFLVP3HFF4NCSN2TKEZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/christmas-china-brings-glittering-decor-foreign-influence-concerns-2023-12-25/Reuters世界中国
Philippine actions in South China Sea 'extremely dangerous' - Chinese state mediaChinese state media accused the Philippines on Monday of repeatedly infringing on China's territory in the South China Sea, spreading false information and colluding with extraterritorial forces to cause trouble. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 01:52:59 GMT Z6SWATAKZVP5LIJM4GX4LNA7A4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-actions-south-china-sea-extremely-dangerous-chinese-state-media-2023-12-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
China earthquake death toll rises to 149, two still missing after a weekOne of China's most powerful earthquakes in recent years straddled the Gansu and Qinghai provinces in an area where many of China's Hui people, a tight-knit ethnic minority, are found. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 00:28:18 GMT 6NMNDMCP5NRXDOA265M7AR6KY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-earthquake-death-toll-rises-149-two-still-missing-after-week-2023-12-25/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russia, Ukraine report six civilians killed in attacks on Kherson, HorlivkaWhile Moscow and Kyiv deny targeting civilians in the war that Russia launched on Ukraine in February 2022, both sides have carried out numerous strikes on each other's infrastructure that is critical to their militaries. Mon, 25 Dec 2023 00:24:48 GMT Y3MXD4DOKBNTNEMWDXEK2VGLIA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-ukraine-report-six-civilians-killed-attacks-kherson-horlivka-2023-12-25/Maria Starkova世界欧洲
Israeli airstrikes kill dozens in one of war's deadliest nights, Gaza officials sayLocal residents and Palestinian media said Israel stepped up air and ground shelling against al-Bureij refugee camp in central Gaza. At least 70 people were killed in an Israeli air strike targeting the Maghazi refugee camp, a Palestinian health ministry spokesperson said. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 23:28:23 GMT BQFD3UWPNBM2RCPVOMACE6ETMI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-airstrikes-kill-dozens-gaza-officials-say-christmas-bloodshed-2023-12-24/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Bassam Masoud, Dan Williams世界中东地区
16 people killed in attack in Nigeria, AFP reportsSixteen people were killed in an attack in Nigeria's north-central state of Plateau, where clashes between herders and farmers are common, the AFP News Agency said on Sunday, citing the Nigerian army. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 22:45:24 GMT 6UIADKHVXNKK5GAZSW6ZYCS6ZM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/16-people-killed-attack-nigeria-afp-2023-12-24/Reuters世界非洲
Migrant caravan spends Christmas on the road before heading to U.S. borderActivist Luis Garcia Villagran urged that migrants must not become bargaining chips in the U.S. presidential election. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 22:38:59 GMT SD4YGC67FRIRZJ43FAXC46D6CM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/migrant-caravan-spends-christmas-road-before-heading-us-borders-2023-12-24/Jose Torres世界美洲
In Moldova, the Christmas spirit is conflict and rivalry for parishionersThe head of Moldova's largest Orthodox Church, subordinated to its Russian parent church, has complained that his ranks were coming under attack in the run-up to Christmas -- marked on two separate days by rival churches in the former Soviet state. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 22:06:06 GMT NHMYKZHRZRMM5JZDYQIEI4ZPGA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/moldova-christmas-spirit-is-conflict-rivalry-parishioners-2023-12-24/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Fire briefly breaks out on Russian nuclear-powered icebreakerA fire that broke out on Russia's only nuclear-powered icebreaker and cargo ship was promptly extinguished, the Murmansk branch of the emergency ministry said late on Sunday. Sun, 24 Dec 2023 21:56:39 GMT 3YNIX65V65JNNME4GWIN2NO2RE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/fire-briefly-breaks-out-Russian-nuclear-powered-icebreaker-2023-12-24/Reuters世界欧洲
